description:
The Old Lady is another one of http://anidb.net/ch11210 [Kiki]`s customers.
As the lady`s electric oven appears to be broken, Kiki helps her heating the old wood stove for baking the herring flaky pastry that Kiki is to deliver to http://anidb.net/ch40191 [the Lady`s granddaughter], and does some other chores in her household such as exchanging light bulbs.
name: Roufujin
